item.name: PARMESAN SPINACH DIP
item.description: Creamy Parmesan cheese dip with spinach and mushrooms served with crisp tortilla chips

item.name: SOUTHWESTERN SALAD
item.description: Fresh grilled chicken, corn, black beans, fontina cheese, diced tomatoes tortilla strips and chiffonade of romaine tossed in a lime cilantro and peanut vinagrette.

item.name: BBQ BACON CHEDDAR CHICKEN
item.description: Chargrilled chicken breast topped with our homemade BBQ sauce, hickory-smoked bacon, cheddar cheese, tomato and lettuce on our baked sesame bun

item.name: HOMEMADE MANICOTTI
item.description: Pasta shells filled with checken, spinach, ricotta and Paramesan cheeses on a bed of tomato sauce, toppped with mozzarella and Paramesan cheeses
